subject: Re: [junit] Junit Installation
msgSnippet: ... Go to Google.com, search for JUnit guide and you can find information about classpath problems. Another option is to use keywords JUnit FAQ . Good luck.
messageBody:
p_pande123 wrote:
> Hi All,
> How to install Junit? I have download zip file and extract all the
> files from it. It creates a floder. I have also set the classpath but
> still it is not working. can anybody will help ?

Go to Google.com, search for "JUnit guide" and you can find information
about classpath problems. Another option is to use keywords "JUnit FAQ".

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
